name: Ahros: One Warrior Chronicle
description: Ahros: One Warrior Chronicle is an adventure VR-game where you shoot big guns, fly dragons and do many other things while restoring peace and order in a world destroyed by global war.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 64 bit Processor: Intel® i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 980 or equivalent DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 11 GB available space Additional Notes: Notice: Requires a virtual reality headset. Proven to work on Gear VR + VRidge. Manufacturers of Pimax HMDs report that this game is compatible with their equipment.
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
